data.eml:eml: A review of the genus Labeo (Teleostei: Cyprinidae) in Sri Lanka

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sudasinghe, Hiranya, Ranasinghe, R. H. Tharindu, Goonatilake, Sampath Alwis, Meegaskumbura, Madhava (2018): A review of the genus Labeo (Teleostei: Cyprinidae) in Sri Lanka. Zootaxa 4486 (3): 201-235, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4486.3.1
